label: Body Jewelry
description: Jewelry worn on various body parts, including nose, tongue, ears, and belly button.
intents: Learn about different types of body jewelry

subcategories.label: Nose Jewelry
subcategories.description: Jewelry specifically designed for nose piercings.
subtopics: How to care for nose piercings

subcategories.label: Tongue Jewelry
subcategories.description: Jewelry specifically designed for tongue piercings.
subtopics: How to care for tongue piercings

subcategories.label: Ear Jewelry
subcategories.description: Jewelry specifically designed for ear piercings.
subtopics: How to care for ear piercings

subcategories.label: Belly Button Jewelry
subcategories.description: Jewelry specifically designed for belly button piercings.
subtopics: How to care for belly button piercings

subcategories.label: Body Chains
subcategories.description: Jewelry that covers multiple body parts and is connected by chains.
